/home/adios/local/bin/mpicxx  -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wfatal-errors -Wall -Wextra -g -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/home/adios/local/lib -Wl,--enable-new-dtags CMakeFiles/phdf5_example.dir/main.cpp.o -o phdf5_example  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /home/adios/local/lib/libhdf5.so /usr/local/lib/libadios2_c_mpi.so.2.10.1 /usr/local/lib/libadios2_c.so.2.10.1 /usr/local/lib/libadios2_cxx11_mpi.so.2.10.1 /usr/local/lib/libadios2_cxx11.so.2.10.1 /home/adios/local/lib/libmpi.so -Wl,-rpath-link,/usr/local/lib
